title: How to study class 11 in class 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: You better not. Listen , first, this is a very important year so focus just on board, 11th stream is going to depend on 10th so if your board result is bad, forget about your dream stream. Second, this is the last year where u will have time for yourself, after this year life is going to be endless stream of hardwork, leaving no time for oneself, enjoy this year to the best

Hey dude, I really appreciate your thirst to study. But I what recommend personally is that don’t be in a hurry to study just relax and do your best in 10th class. If you say you have time then study your 10th syllabus in-depth this is the foundation for both 11th and 12th. ATB!!!
